dmca.title: [EV1-C2064475Q] Copyright violations.
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at www.ev1servers.net/About/dmca.aspx

Legal Response Team

-----Original Message-----
From: abuse@ev1.net [mailto:abuse@ev1.net] 
Sent: Thursday, December 07, 2006 4:32 AM
To: DMCA
Subject: [EV1-C2064475Q] Copyright violations.

==== Forwarded Ticket ====
1. Copyright violations.
Added by system at Thursday, Dec 7 2006 10:23 am

<abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net>; Thu Dec 7 10:23:06 2006

Return-Path: originalwheelman@hotmail.com 

 (multipart/mixed)
Multipart prefix (text/plain)
This is a multi-part message in MIME format. 
 
MIME element (text/plain)
The server you are hosting with the doimain name thewheeloflol.com, IP
address of 207.218.208.15 has a copyrighted picture of my client posted
illegaly.  I have attached screenshots of the picture in question as
well as the source code for the webpages on which they are displayed.  I
have noted that there are numerous other pictures which may be subject
to copyright also hosted on the site.  I request that the infringments
be taken down per the DMCA.  Thank you for your time. 
 
Sincerely,
Johnathon Leonard
